import React from 'react'; import './OurStory.css'; import heroBackground from '../../images/hero-background.jpg'; // Using as placeholder const OurStory = () => { const imageStyle = { backgroundImage: `url(${heroBackground})` }; return (

OUR STORY

Kaboul Gourmet, a unique venue in the heart of Chelsea, London, where old meets new.

Our Afghan cuisine venue offers modern Afghan fine dining with European influences. Our unique venue boasts beautiful handcrafted interiors with ornate details, creating the perfect backdrop for all occasions.

Our restaurant takes pride of place amongst the modern buildings of Chelsea and London. Our elegant venue has an effortless buzz that transports you to a world of fantastic food, fine wine and unmatched service.

Our kitchen ensures a seasonal and sustainable menu continues to be on offered to our guests using fresh and local produce. Our Executive Chef works closely with our culinary team to create a menu with an emphasis on bold flavours, a balance of textures and a continued focus on all Kaboul Gourmet's core values.

DISCOVER MORE SUBSCRIBE
); }; export default OurStory;
